description: Creates a layout in the Cases domain. Layouts define the following configuration in the top section and More Info tab of the Cases user interface:

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Information about which fields will be present in the layout, and information about the order of the fields. basic (dict) --- Content specific to BasicLayout type. It configures fields in the top panel and More Info tab of Cases user interface. moreInfo (dict) --- This represents sections in a tab of the page layout. sections (list) --- Ordered list containing different kinds of sections that can be added. (dict) --- This represents a sections within a panel or tab of the page layout. fieldGroup (dict) --- Consists of a group of fields and associated properties. Represents an ordered list containing field related information. (dict) --- Object for field related information. Unique identifier of a field. name (string) --- Name of the field group. topPanel (dict) --- This represents sections in a panel of the page layout. name (string) --- Name of the field group.

nested_params.name: basic
nested_params.description: Content specific to BasicLayout type. It configures fields in the top panel and More Info tab of Cases user interface.

nested_params.name: moreInfo
nested_params.description: This represents sections in a tab of the page layout.

nested_params.name: sections
nested_params.description: Ordered list containing different kinds of sections that can be added.

nested_params.name: fieldGroup
nested_params.description: Consists of a group of fields and associated properties.

nested_params.name: fields
nested_params.description: Represents an ordered list containing field related information.

nested_params.name: topPanel
nested_params.description: This represents sections in a panel of the page layout.

nested_params.name: sections
nested_params.description: Ordered list containing different kinds of sections that can be added.

nested_params.name: fieldGroup
nested_params.description: Consists of a group of fields and associated properties.

nested_params.name: fields
nested_params.description: Represents an ordered list containing field related information.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the layout. It must be unique for the Cases domain.

nested_items.name: layoutArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the newly created layout.

nested_items.name: layoutId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the layout.
